description:
My place is close to the airport. You’ll love my place because of the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Spacious, furnished cozy 1 bedroom with Jacuzzi and stand up shower. Full cable package with wifi. Queen size and sofa bed. Use of kitchenette with dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator. Washer and dryer available. 1 30 in TV in the bedroom and 1 60 in TV in living room. Treadmill available for your workout needs. 5 mins from JFK International Airport. Excellent area. Recreational Park 3 blocks away.

Public transportation: 5 minutes walk to the Bus. 15 minutes by bus to the subway.
name: Spacious, cozy one bedroom
review:
From the day we checked in, Shondel was the greatest host. Her place was clean, welcoming and cozy. Our first night there we had an unexpected emergency and she was so understanding.
Any issues or questions I had, she was available. She allowed us our privacy but checked in on us to see how we were doing.
I would absolutely recommend this place and stay again in the future.
